author: @sc9376
text: Hahaha…I died laughing 😂 when XIAOJUN’S expression changed once he saw JAEMIN walking out as one of the MC’s because he probably was thinking about the scene with Nomin on the sofa (that he did before) & wondering “OMG, what is he going to make me  do? 😅” LOL Too funny!! XIAOJUN’S expression changing was so priceless, cute & funny!! 🤣🤣 But he was such a trooper whenever Jaemin told him to do something!! 👏 And YUTA was so sincere with the back hug, 3 beautiful things said at the end, and how he kept telling Xiaojun he could call whenever he needed to throughout the episode!! 🥰 THIS is why YUTA is my ultimate bias in NCT!! ,That man’s heart is so genuine, loving & caring!! I swear I hope he will be blessed with a life partner that will love him unconditionally like I’m sure he will give to that lucky person…YUTA deserves someone like that!! I’m not delusional enough to believe it would ever be me, but if I could find someone like him, I’d consider myself so blessed! 😉🥰👏👏👏💚🎶🎵🎤💚♥️

I hope they spend a lot of time playing games together and eating Mint Choco ice cream

text:
YuJun are really a visual attack duo and them in flower crowns with chokers definitely proves it. Also Yuta did god’s work by thinking of putting it as a choker.

Yuta is so precious tho, like he always knows how to make people feel good and is attentive, his emotional awareness is very high and he gives the best compliments effortlessly.

Xiaojun is such an awkward guy, he always makes things entertaining and his helpless face is everything lmao.
Also Jaemin and Xiaojun seem really close and their chemistry is very good, it surprised me will be looking out for these two from now on.
